oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Extralabel drug use in cattle with case examples
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fajt, Virginia R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cattle veterinarians have the responsibility of selecting, usÂ­ing, dispensing and prescribing drugs in a legal manner. The process for drug approval for food animals in the U.S. is briefly reviewed, and the federal law allowing extralabel drug use is detailed. Application of regulations to exemplar case scenarios are presented for illustration and discussion.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 59 (2025): 2025 Recent Graduate Conference Proceedings; 91-93
